ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] (OT) Tech problem, any suggestions?
ygData.msgSnippet: The typist behind Menuette wrote: IMHO a rule of thumb for me on whether I expect my box to run Win2k well .. did the makers of my cards drivers have WinNT
ygData.messageBody:
The typist behind Menuette wrote:

IMHO a rule of thumb for me on whether I expect my
box to run Win2k well .. did the makers of my cards drivers have WinNT
drivers for them? If so .. its a good bet they had a jump on 2K drivers.

***
That was part of why I went with ME. My old PC is dual boot NT & 95. EQ
never ran on the NT side. I didn't want to have that problem with 2K.

But as far as not having a problem with ME in the two months I've had
it...my PC crashed twice last night (not in EQ though). I think Kitasi's
coworkers jinxed me. :P

Evulia of Tunare
